feedback_concepts.description: Classify follow-up messages for success scoring

concepts.positive: thanks perfect works great exactly right excellent awesome helpful solved
concepts.negative: wrong didn't work not what I wanted broken still failing incorrect nope no
concepts.retry: try again different approach another way let's redo alternative instead
concepts.proceed: yes go ahead approved sounds good continue proceed confirm okay
concepts.clarification: what do you mean can you explain not sure I don't understand elaborate
concepts.partial: almost works but sort of close needs adjustment nearly there

concepts.task_start: let's begin start working on implement I want to create need to build
concepts.planning: how should I approach plan design architecture think about structure
concepts.implementation: now implement code create build write develop construct make
concepts.testing: test verify check run tests make sure works validate confirm
concepts.task_done: done finished complete ship it deploy merge commit push ready
concepts.blocked: stuck can't figure out help needed error failing doesn't work
